entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0.2xx] Change Global Property Flow to Not Flow Publish* Properties #28645
  • Error NU1012 when creating a .Net Maui app in Visual Studio 2022 ver 17.3.6 #28629

Closed

  • Mysterious new NuGet source (/usr/local/share/dotnet/library-packs) #28642

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update arcade dependency to pick up new pools and build images #28641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to use -svc pools #28638
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in tab-completion.md #28636
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Trim away FullFramework release leg #28639
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28619
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2023324 #28626
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Servicing-consider, Area-ILLink
  • Return workload manifests in defined, controllable order #28627
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 7.0.0
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
